Hi Jamie, 

Joel has managed to hide the payment on checkout, but still have it there when they click the accept and pay link from the email! 

Have a play and let me once you are ready for us to replicate this on live.

Hi Jamie, 

I'm free now... is it a good time for you?

Hi Heath,

Thanks for setting this up. I've had a play around and think I've managed to configure the plugin in the least intrusive way, for the end user - maintaining the same user experience that Australia gets.

I also think it will take less styling (if any at all).

Lets tee up a screen share call. I'm free all morning, any time from now.

Jump into Zoom when you ready and let me know 😀

Kind regards,

Hey Jamie, 

We have installed the FREE plugin on the staging site and it works well, here is a link: http://nuplasapiaristsuppliesnz.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com

The biggest limitation of the FREE version is that the requests for quotes are not treated as 'orders' so it becomes a manual response process and adding shipping etc is cumbersome. 

I recommend the paid option. Did you want to purchase and send it across?

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: https://yithemes.com/themes/plugins/yith-woocommerce-request-a-quote/ @joel can you please add this to the nuplas NZ staging site and send me the link to test. Cheers

Hi Heath,

Thanks for the video. I realise it's taken a while to get back to you. We're flat out!

I've looked into this a bit further and there's a nice extension for WooCommerce that facilitates quote negotiations between the buyer and seller.

From the WooCommerce orders admin area, you can review quote requests and add various line items to a quote, including a custom shipping fee. WooCommerce then handles all the workflows from there on and the buyer can pay for the revised quote.

Do you have any experience using this? Give it a try and let me know what you think. If you think it's okay can we please trial it on staging NZ?

https://yithemes.com/themes/plugins/yith-woocommerce-request-a-quote/

Demo Store (Note you can demo the front and backend)
https://plugins.yithemes.com/yith-woocommerce-request-a-quote/?current_demo_user=demo


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek
